passage.text: In the title mol-ecule, C19H20O6, the conformation about the C=C bond of the central enone group is E. The dihedral angle formed by the benzene rings is 11.6 (2) . The hy-droxy group is involved in an intra-molecular O-H O hydrogen bond. In the crystal, weak C-H O hydrogen bonds link the mol-ecules into chains along [010].
